article_title: Hamas says death toll passes 14,000 in Gaza.
sentence: The  Hamas-run  Gaza  government  says  the  number  of  people  who've  been  killed  in  the  territory  since  the  war  began  has  reached  14,128.

article_title: Hamas says death toll passes 14,000 in Gaza.
sentence: It  says  that  5,840  children  are  among  the  dead.
